fields.bio: Hello, I'm Alice, your go-to source for unique handcrafted pottery. As a passionate pottery artisan, I transform clay into one-of-a-kind pieces inspired by the beauty of nature. My pottery reflects the serene landscapes I encounter during my hikes. Explore my Pixo shop and bring a touch of nature's elegance into your home. Each piece tells a story of craftsmanship and love for the art. Welcome to my world of pottery artistry! üè∫üåøüõí

Hello there, I'm Mia, your mosaic tile expert and creator. With a deep passion for crafting intricate mosaic designs, I'm dedicated to bringing you the finest mosaic tiles for your creative projects. My shop is your gateway to a world of stunning mosaic artistry, where every tile is a testament to craftsmanship and creativity. Explore my collection and let's make your mosaic dreams a reality, one tile at a time. Welcome to Mosaic Magic! üß©üé®

Hey there, I'm Grace, your vintage fashion curator extraordinaire. I'm on a mission to bring back the timeless elegance of yesteryears with a collection of vintage clothing that tells stories of decades past. Dive into my virtual vintage boutique, where every piece is a treasure waiting to be rediscovered. From classic silhouettes to iconic styles, we're on a journey through fashion history. Join me in celebrating the charm of vintage fashion ‚Äì where style knows no expiration date.

With a passion for woodworking and a love for the game of kings, I craft exquisite chess boards that marry art and strategy. Explore my collection and discover the beauty of precision in each piece. From classic designs to modern interpretations, these boards are more than a playing surface; they're a testament to the art of chess. Join me on this chessboard journey, where every move is a masterpiece waiting to be made.

With the gentle stroke of a blade, I carve life into pieces of wood, transforming them into delightful companions for your soul. My craft is inspired by nature's beauty, and each comfort bird carries the serenity of the woods within. Join me in the art of whittling and discover the therapeutic magic of these handcrafted treasures. Let's bring a touch of nature's comfort to your world, one bird at a time.

Hello, I'm Kate, and I'm passionate about crafting handmade soap that's as beautiful as it is beneficial. üõÅ 
 üåü What I Do: 
 I meticulously handcraft each bar of soap with love and care using natural and nourishing ingredients. Every batch is a work of art, infused with the goodness of nature. 
 üå± My Inspiration: 
 My love for nature, hiking, and all things natural led me to create these exquisite soaps. I draw inspiration from the serene beauty of the outdoors, infusing my creations with the essence of the wild. 
 üå∏ Crafted with Purpose: 
 I believe in the power of self-care and the importance of choosing products that are kind to your skin and the environment. That's why my soaps are free from harsh chemicals and cruelty-free. 
 üõí Shop Now: 
Explore my collection and experience the joy of handmade soap. Your skin will thank you, and you'll fall in love with the art of bathing all over again.

üúÉ Thank you for stopping by Earth Folk! | Processing Time: 1 Business Day | We specialize in small batch, natural body care and holistic remedies to enhance your self care rituals. Effective self care rituals do not have to include toxic formations. Therefore, we stay away from hard-to-pronounce synthetic ingredients and fragrances. We sustainably source high quality wildcrafted and organic raw materials whenever possible.

I grew up traipsing around creeks with my pockets full of newts and beetles. My grandparents raised birds and my sister sold hamsters to the local pet store. I think the core of my personality was formed in gardens, tidepools, meadows, and mud puddles. As an adult, I wanted to share my love of the natural world and inspire the next generation to investigate all the life that surrounds us. I became a biology teacher and moved to the Pacific Northwest, where I engage my students in the classroom with homemade games based on the science we are learning. While my games are designed with students in mind, they are also heavily influenced by the variety of strategy board games I grew up playing. They are rooted in real science, but strategic enough to find a home in any game night rotation. My design process includes sourcing, colorizing, manipulating, and altering vintage art in the public domain until I've created a sort of digital collage that is printed on cards. Text and borders may come from a 1700s map, while organism art might be a combination of two lithograph prints from the 1800s. The result is a beautiful game that is equal parts strategic and instructive. I have been humbled by the community's generous reception of my games and look forward to designing expansions and sequels, as well as all new games, in the future. My instagram account provides updates on my progress and also shares my personal nature photography, along with interesting biology and ecology facts related to the photos. Thank you so much for your support and encouragement!
